d31f40b6-c709-4583-b054-ee3a3017c4fc.notes: When an item says it may be used as a weapon at a -1 penalty, that penalty is already included in the weapon's stats.

356ee834-43c5-4066-8872-004f1af432fd.notes: May be used with Two-Handed Sword at a -1 penalty.

55bbff5e-f418-469d-9898-d00d7bbdf2bc.notes: A bottle of wine (5 drinks) or liquor (16 drinks of rotgut, schnapps, vodka, etc.), or a couple of bottles of beer, ale, etc. (2 drinks); Roll vs. HT after heavy drinking, -2 to DX, IQ, and -4 to self-control rolls if failed.

aeca809f-6864-4967-b9c9-112b313ee49f.notes: 预防或治疗（需要 1d 天）感染。

4e49e219-04a8-49e5-b113-4e2e70ee7b0c.notes: 某一种毒素的解毒药剂。10 份装

68b382f3-3592-40c2-aa02-f6080a2b0876.notes: DR 8 vs. cutting and piercing attacks; DR 2 against all other attacks.

be803111-ea9c-4548-9ddd-a3eb8f6d8636.notes: 半打伤口的绷带。可能是干净的衣物、带粘合剂的敷料或喷射的“塑料皮肤”，视 TL 而定。对应急救技能的基本装备。

168aaf99-792c-47c4-9ce4-617ce9c86238.notes: May be used with Axe/Mace and Two-Handed Axe/Mace at no penalty. Using Two-Handed Axe/Mace grants +1 to damage.

fab86ad0-9443-4df5-820c-cc1e387e1098.notes: Grapples leg with ST 15; Gives +1 to survival when trapping; Damage 1d+3 crushing to leg.

cdfd51c0-7105-40a2-96e9-ec0f31416196.notes: Grapples leg with ST 8; Gives +1 to Survival when trapping; Damage is 1d-1 crushing to leg.

1a4714c1-e4dc-4a93-907a-33009463dade.notes: Fist loads (ashtrays, cue balls, etc.) count as Brass Knuckles with no skill penalty.

e1f7c314-708f-47d0-ada3-2c1b298fcc36.notes: Long rebar, pipes, and sticks use this weapon's stats with crushing attacks and attack at a -1 penalty.

78fc289e-cf43-4d2f-b8e7-0c7345c7aec3.notes: 对应摄影技能的基础装备。额外的胶片 32 张装 ($10，NEG)。

88fcca01-c1f1-4145-901e-4608f01b5b81.notes: 每 4 小时使用 0.25 加仑煤油

6ee8b31b-984a-4c47-8fb5-45420c335e1b.notes: Holds 1 quart of liquid (2 lbs. if water).

8bd56c37-87c2-4cf7-b738-40296e7e8728.notes: 只在一些地区工作，$20 月费。$250，持续10小时。

330b7e99-db59-4376-9ba8-611c87e571ba.notes: CHAINSAW. May be used with Two-Handed Axe/Mace at no penalty. Cannot parry. Runs for two hours on half a gallon of gasoline. Lawnmowers are identical, but take a -1 penalty to hit.

71d42e82-70af-41d1-8947-f6b0db05a608.notes: +2 to ST to pry open stuck things; May be used with Axe/Mace or thrown with Thrown Weapon (Axe/Mace), both at -1 penalty.

f166b36c-ceb5-4b3a-9964-5b0e660934a2.notes: May be used as a great axe; no skill penalty.

d01c5d4d-d12e-4510-ad89-cf493da9e466.notes: A complete kit for treating wounds, with bandages, ointments, etc.; +1 to First Aid.

00f20803-0b9b-4df7-bb06-a07c655908f0.notes: Basic gear for Fishing skill; needs a pole.

9eedee20-0d5c-40b7-a541-a6f7edcf48bf.notes: DR 7 vs. cutting and piercing attacks; DR 1 against all other attacks.

db350b2c-c266-44b7-b51e-a571d2c02288.notes: Illuminates 5-yard radius for 30 minutes; starts fires.

74f9b938-e17d-46a9-8e1b-2c67629203d2.notes: Disposable launcher shoots bright flare to 70 yards. Roll vs. Traps to rig it as a “trip flare.”

1710db72-0beb-4c18-a2a6-ae52e48d45f5.notes: 30 英尺光束，持续 5 小时

db3f2c56-0440-403f-a56a-21677a29f2d4.notes: One meal of dehydrated soup or vegetables. Requires a pint of hot water.

7fc0a39f-7701-465a-8b64-ea9cf535d1e2.notes: A meal of ready-to-prepare food: veg- etables, seafood, meat, fruits, etc. Shelf life is limited with- out refrigeration.

6848cf35-58bb-46a7-9a43-73627e9e7128.notes: May be used with Two-Handed Axe/Mace at a -1 penalty.

029ebd10-e34c-43c0-b7f9-12b3462629f7.notes: 团队的生存和烹饪技能的基本装备。烹饪用锅、绳索、短柄斧等等，供 3~8 位队员使用。

45177e64-971c-45b2-a341-502514b79bda.notes: May be used with Axe/Mace at no penalty.

5c148ba4-8d48-4145-a5d0-6795564b14e4.notes: A meal of well-seasoned and salted meat, reduced to only 4 oz. by drying. One meal.

4003cbd9-d3a9-4238-83be-36e41f6f9568.notes: Basic equipment for Natural Sciences; -5 with improvised equipment

c5c8d2c7-bc76-4aa2-b963-7600b9a52275.notes: 1 品脱油可以燃烧 24 小时

dbe1e243-65a4-49ac-b8ad-2b95e2da11c0.notes: May be used with Knife at no penalty.

features.situation: 为闪避、招架、盾挡提供奖励，以对抗来自前面或有盾牌防护方向的攻击

0595b9a6-70e8-4ad7-801e-6c4c338b9191.notes: 将图像保存在光学磁片上。

f12c458e-3180-488b-b5a1-00117540b291.notes: 手掌大小，3 小时录制时间

3714e700-3071-4b14-be42-e5979c7c9fe9.notes: 野营的最小装备：没有它，生存检定 -2。包括餐具、火绒盒或打火石与钢片、毛巾等等 TL 所允许的物件。

3a2b7451-3577-41e9-aa36-0be522c33cb9.notes: For pitching tents, fishing, or prodding items.

ac6abedd-06fc-4f4c-940a-6b79ecec2723.notes: For things you wouldn’t touch with a 6’ pole.

a0a70698-7b06-4dd6-af71-01fb8cbfd595.notes: Basic equipment necessary for Armoury; -5 with improvised equipment.

c2fa232e-00d1-4ce7-a8ee-4c9273140d49.notes: Basic equipment necessary for Electronics Repair; -5 with improvised equipment.

9693d1d4-f0b8-446c-a449-bc8002580834.notes: Basic equipment necessary for Mechanic; -5 with improvised equipment.

d534c5c6-06f5-4da6-8d3c-67341383cf92.notes: 传统的步话机，2 英里范围。持续 12 小时。

c215091f-00b8-48bd-9d63-0cc6a9a16ae6.notes: 带喉麦，1 英里范围。持续 12 小时。

f65764c2-d896-40a4-b33a-a76e1042149c.notes: 带喉麦，1 英里范围。安全加密型号。持续 12 小时。

bab13ea4-06bd-4527-bebc-4cbeb01a9586.notes: 可携带 12 支 箭或矢

7c4ec944-85fe-43cb-8c1f-d55be495c0db.notes: Maybe be used with Two-Handed Sword at a -1 penalty.

features.situation: 为闪避、招架、盾挡提供奖励，以对抗来自前面或有盾牌防护方向的攻击

8d01dead-11ec-4527-8b86-9baf5634e963.notes: A high-carbohydrate snack such as an “energy bar” counts as a “decent meal” when resting, restoring +1 FP; see Recovering from Fatigue (p. B427). The GM may let those who don’t rest regain 1 FP but dock them 2 FP two hours later.

3f85419a-7520-4b15-8b7f-43b109db572c.notes: A 32-ounce drink formulated to increase hydration and energy levels. It functions like a Snack and counts as a quart of water for hydration purposes.

e2537bb0-6706-4b5f-9dbc-b85b3f14dfbd.notes: Holds 100 lbs; DR4, with key lock

efbc3500-31d0-49a9-bda4-770a4f17af87.notes: One year's supply of freeze-dried food.

32470e5c-019d-46ea-9763-77edaf5d9e6f.notes: DR 12 vs. cutting and piercing attacks; DR 3 against all other attacks.

32130e2b-adfe-452b-a5c6-1232488a5163.notes: 包括绳子；需要一根 6 英尺杆

3117372b-9c1b-4440-93db-2b7745a73c8e.notes: 包括绳子；需要两根 6 英尺杆

27bc6415-5bbc-44e1-bfc0-770a17c828cc.notes: 为 1 品脱热水（24 小时）或冷水（72 小时）保温

34e89fe3-3a1a-4384-b18c-d0bfe6d3c9b7.notes: 只可接收；连接无线电台。持续 8 小时。

f5b2e554-774c-46ee-9e3f-0338744e21c6.notes: 5''×5'' 平板屏幕，持续 4 小时。

c7562076-5f4e-474f-b30e-d50f8f41f35c.notes: 一瓶 50 片；每片可净化 1 夸脱水
